content_block_static.name: USASOC Initial Configuration
content_block_static.static_content:
1. Add Administrative Logins

Navigate to Administration/Users and create application administrative accounts in ServiceNow, assigning the following roles:
  • admin
  • security_admin

Note: In order to be able to add the security_admin role, you will need to elevate roles to security_admin.

Accounts on internet cloud instance

In order to properly attribute where changes were made, administrative accounts on internet cloud instances (hosted by ServiceNow) the login account name should start with the person's last name, followed by their first initial, and end in "_da".
Example: Leonard Erwine ⇒ erwinel_da

2. Import Initial Update Set

  1. Navigate to System Update Sets/Retrieved Update Sets.
  2. Click on Import Update Set from XML and upload the Initial_Update_Set_1.xml file in the sys_remote_update_set/setup/stage_1 folder of the sources directory.
  3. Preview and commit the update set, which will be named Initial Update Set Stage 1 V1, to prepare the ServiceNow instance.

Unclass Only

Load and apply the Unclass_Setup_1.xml File in the sys_remote_update_set/setup/stage_1 folder of the sources directory to apply the Unclass Setup Stage 1 update set, which prepares the ServiceNow instance for unclass deveopment.
